abstract: Thousands of mourners travel to Corona, Calif, to view Nancy Reagan's coffin on display at Ronald Reagan Presidential Library; many mourners say they came not only to remember Reagan and her husband, but also dignity and class couple brought to nation's politics and presidency.
lead_paragraph: Several thousand people traveled to the Ronald Reagan Presidential Library to pay respects and celebrate the romance of the Reagans, who were married more than 50 years.

headline.main: Mourning Nancy Reagan, and Looking Back at the Class and Dignity of an Era
headline.print_headline: Mourners See Class, Dignity and Love in the Reagans

snippet: Several thousand people traveled to the Ronald Reagan Presidential Library to pay respects and celebrate the romance of the Reagans, who were married more than 50 years.

keywords.value: Reagan, Ronald, Presidential Library and Museum
